    Methods in MySTARS that return Student 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Student[] CourseIndex.getStudents()
    Returns an array of students currently enrolled in the index.
    protected Student CourseIndex.removeStudent​(java.lang.String username)
    Directly removes a Student from the CourseIndex.

    Creates a copy of this student object with minimal information.
    private Student SwapIndexView.verifySecondUser​(java.lang.String courseCode)
    For swapping index with a peer, this method checks if peer is a valid user that is registered for the relevant course.
    Methods in MySTARS with parameters of type Student 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void CourseIndex.addStudent​(Student student)
    Directly adds a Student to the CourseIndex and bypasses all checks.

    Compares this student with the specified student for order.

    Prints a list of courses based on the CourseStatus from a Student's courses.
    static void Helper.sendMailNotification​(Student receipient, java.lang.String course)
    A method that sends an email from the Administrative Gmail Account to the user if their course has been registered.

    Removes student from the enrolled register.
